content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were sitting on my porcg. we noticed a light in the sky moving unlike an airplane. it traveled from horizon clear to the other in one second, then was stationary, flew in irregular path at different speeds. watched for about 20 minutes, then it brightened considerably and disappeared
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A light in the sky that traveled from one horizon to the other in just seconds, hovered also

content.detailedDescription:
I was visiting my common law wife's relatives who had a cottage on an island toward the southern shore of lake nipissing eight miles south of the northern shoreline of the lake directly across from the family's residence in the town of sturgeon falls, ontario. the time was about 7:00 or 8:00 p.M. in the evening. the cottage was totally in shade from the light of the sun which would set in the west in about one hour. it was a perfectly clear day with no clouds in the sky. we were all inside sitting in the living room of the cottage. my wife was sitting on the sofa which backed up against the picture window on the north side of the cottage. i was sitting on a sofa opposite her. her relatives joined us there. there were six of us, three on each sofa just chatting. there was still enough light from the outside that we were sitting in the darkened living room but had not yet put on any lights in the room. i was looking toward the eastern end of the cottage when the room suddenly began to light up with a warm yellow-pinkish light. my wife asked me what was causing the light because she knew it was coming from behind her through the picture window. i said: "i don't know." and then looked out the window. it was then that i saw the pulsing orb of light that was 200 to 300 feet above the opposite shoreline that was eight miles across the water from the cottage. it was well clear of the tree-line. the orb was huge. my guess was that it was about five or six city buses, end-to-end in diameter - i'm guessing around 200 to 300 feet or more in diameter. 

it so happened that there was a pair of kid's binoculars beside me which i picked up. the optics were made of plastic which provided a clear image but not one the clarity of high quality binoculars but at that distance much better than looking with the naked eye. i'm guessing the power of binoculars was about 5x to 10x. using them brought the image of the orb much closer and easier to view. the orb was pulsating light in all directions from the centre outward, with an undefined outer edge that appeared as if the light was spiking all along the outer edge of orb. there was no dimensional sense concerning the orb, a bit like taking a quick look at the sun with your sun-glasses on. you have no sense that it is a three-dimensional globe. instead it looks more like a flat pancake of light that is emanating light in 360 degrees away from the centre of the orb. 

but here's the really cool part. i had been watching this orb emanating light in all directions when it appeared to close and suddenly disappear. let me describe what i mean. imagine you have drawn a perfect circle and folded the right half over the top of the left-hand side of the circle. now imagine your line of sight is directly divided by the north-south centre line of the circle when the right-hand side of the circle gradually starts to close in the direction of the lef-hand side of the circle. you can see the right-hand side of the circle diminishing in size until it reaches the mid-point of the fold so that you are now looking at only the semi-circle on the left-hand side. where the right-hand side of the circle had been glowing yellow-pinkish light that was totally opaque (i.E. you couldn't see the blue sky behind it) was suddenly the blue sky as it always appeared without obstruction of any kind. 

the right-hand side continued to close over the left-hand half circle so that as it closed the light became like a crescent of a moon that was being eclipsed by the earth, with the crescent getting smaller until the right hand side of the circle had completely covered the left-hand semi-circle, at which point the emanating light was completely extinguished leaving the uninterrupted blue sky as it had been before the light had suddenly appeared. 

the time period for the "closing of the book" process took slightly longer than a second to complete. it was a gradual process, not like someone slamming an open book shut. 

the minute the orb of light was extinguished the cottage return to its original darkness. 

what i witnessed that day is something i have never seen before or since. the only thing that even comes close is like looking at the setting sun about a half-hour before sundown. except the light was much brighter but not so bright as to wreck your eyesight. i think if i had been on the far shore i would not have been able to look at the light. it would have been too bright to stare at but not as bright as an arc-welder.
content.summary: Glowing pulsating orb of light 300' across yellow pink in colour emanated spikey light closed like a book

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Standing on the third floor of an apartment looking at the mountain south of mica mountain was 5-6 bright white lights in a semi circle not high above (and staying very near) the mountain... some dimmed and turned red, then some seemed to dim completely. many times you could see 2-3 lights very close together dimly. there were many very bright white flashes of light where a few crafts seemed to disappeared. after tuning on and off, being bright white and bright red and dim red for nearly 30 minutes, they disappeared for 5-10 min and reappeared heading east, in a line at one point and thn finagle formation before disappearing from view.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 6-10 crafts dim to bright red, sometimes bright white, white flashes

content.detailedDescription:
Not much to tell here as i did not notice the object until i was looking through the pictures i had taken that day. as you can see the sky was beautifully clear and i was outside when a blackhawk helicopet came flying over. i started shooting multiple frames with my nikon d60 as the helicopter flew over head. i just happened to notice the elongated black cylinder/cigar shaped object in the lower left corner of one of the pictures. some folks told me that they thought it was a bug, but i have to disagree. as you can see the helicopter rotor blades are captured perfectly and i'm sure they are rotating much faster than if a bug were to be flying through the frame. if it were a bug then i would expect it to be a single point, maybe a little bit of blur but not like what is in the photo. curiously my maximum resolution picture of this event has vanished from my computer. no idea how this happened. the original picture was shot at 10.2 mega pixel. this pic is much lower resolution but you can still see the object. just zoom in to the lower left corner and you will see it. so.... any feedback on what this could be? and please dont cry hoax! i dont even know how to use photoshop.
peace all, eyes to the sky
content.summary: Took several pictures of a blackhawk helicopter passing overhead, noticed a strange object in one of the frames when i was reviewing the pictures i had shot that day.

content.detailedDescription: Here's a few photos i took on september 03, 2014, of some strange and unnatural looking clouds. it seems we all need to get over our infatuation with "flying metallic discs" in our thinking of what contemporary ufos should look like. over 65 years have passed since the roswell and aztec ufo crashes in the late 40s, and the "i love lucy" show is no longer a prime time staple on tv. i think it's safe to assume that our otherworldly visitors have not been sitting on their hands over this 65 year time span in regards to their own technological advances.
content.summary: Not your daddy's ufos

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my bench on the deck in my backyard looking up at the stars.
i then noticed a chevron shaped object with 5 or 6 blue/white steady lights on each side moving from south to north.
i can't recall if one side was longer than the other or not..
like 5 lights on one side and 6 on the other or vice versa.
it was moving completely silent. 
it appeared to be at the altitude of satellites but moving much faster.
it appeared directly overhead and was out of my sight within 10 seconds.
constant speed and unwavering direction. 14˚n
now 60 minutes after seeing this object my heart is still racing.
when i saw it i knew what i was seeing but couldn't believe what i was seeing.
i have now seen something i cannot explain.
i'm more disturbed by this event than anything right now.
content.summary: I saw a chevron shaped object move silently north rather fast.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
Driving to a friends house, as i approached the top of a hill i quickly noticed a spherical goldish white lit up craft looking thing in my sight, fairly low in sky, disappeared behind trees/houses, so i quickly changed direction and drove towards it.   got video and several pictures as i was driving, for a mile or so, reached a pond/clearing and had a better view... pulled over to take video.  stopped for about 5 minutes taking video, there were two spheres, at the time i thought there was only one, and one was the moon?  though after looking at video i saw there were clearly two spheres of light, moving parallel while driving, then, when stopped at one point i think they both hovered and ascended a bit, then one disappeared because the last few videos only show one.   far away video looks like a bright white light, up close zoom videos show goldish red.  one video shows what seems to be a ring like pattern on object.     i was very very very excited, nervous, scared.  after filming for a bit, i noticed it disappeared and flashed, and that's when i got scared and felt it was almost coming towards me or something, so i panicked and drove off.   in actuality it was probably pretty far from me, though it was a cloudy night, and i saw it clear as day, so it must have not been too far.  i thought i may have seen the same thing a few hours later, chased after it, took video, but it seems to be moving faster, and you can see blinking red and blue lights on that one, so probably an airplane?    mind: blown!  i did some research and saw a very simliar video filmed over manchester airport in uk the very same night!  

also note, some of the videos uploaded sideways, couldnt' figure out how to rotate them ... sorry !
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Unknown
content.summary: Two spherical white-goldish lights, low in sky, moved parallel, seemed to hover over pond, one dissapeared

content.detailedDescription: We were at the beach near cancun mexico at 9:00 pm .A few objects star looking,flew with very high speed , zigzagging,sharply changing direction,chasing each other.I and my wife were surprised and exited.The objects disappeared in 6-10 seconds.
content.summary: Single object ,two objects ,high speed sharp change of direction, chasing each other

content.detailedDescription:
Last two papers 


a very bright light
content.summary: Bright light

content.detailedDescription:
This report was filed for the witness by robert spearing, ssd, nj, fi # 21140. this information was brought to my attention while investigating case 64397 - black triangle in nj on march 24, 2015. witness recollected this case when i asked her if she had previous experiences. please feel free to contact me through cms if necessary. i consider this case a candidate for the mufon experiencer research team. has many characteristics of an abductee.
****************************************************************************
witness was driving from lakewood nj to salem mass. somewhere in mass. in the mountains on a lonely highway late at night she felt compelled to turn off the highway. at first she felt other cars couldn't see her when she honked. next bright unwavering lights red yellow and green filled her rear window and surrounded her. next her car was enveloped in a thick fog. it smelled like sulfur. there was a swishing slapping sound like a car wash.
lost memory of 2 hours and suddenly was in front on hotel ramada without knowing how she got there. engine was burned. water pump had holes.Transmission was bad. battery was bad. car color was changed from white to grey. no drugs or alcohol involved. feelings of disassociation. 

after this she was suddenly good in calculus. became a scientist and a nurse.

has dreams of a humanoid god in white with long fingers.

can attract animals.

feels she has powers after event. 

mother was barren 10 years and suddenly witness was born in phillipines.

escaped death from japanese army as baby in a genocide.
content.summary: Lights in rear view. enveloped in sulfuric gooey cloud. lost time. car affected

content.detailedDescription: I saw a ufo while snorkeling in hanamua bay hawaii. it rose from behind the hills on my right, then moved to the middle part of the bay over the ocean and made some unhurried moves in straightlines and was stopping and starting on a dime. it then moved to my left and lowered itself from view under the hills. i just happened to notice this thing and actually filmed it although no evidence remains of that because i deleted the video. it was too far away in the sky to see very well on cam. the thing looked like a ty fighter from the stars wars movies but more antenna-like. i pointed it out to my dad who was there and he said it was a drone. my feeling was bewilderment in that no one else was looking at it.
content.summary: I say this ufo over hanauma bay in hawaii. it hovered in three places and moved in straight lines and could stop on a dime. i watched it for 5-10 minutes

content.detailedDescription: O was coming from the store with my girlfriend,i looked up because i always look up because its not the first time i've seen a ufo. it was so many about fifthy or more of them.Headed north/east direction.We both saw them it was so many i got spoked and we went in the apartment.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: i took photos of the ufos.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving my parents house, when i noticed three huge orange lights across the ohio river in the sky.  they faded out as quick as i saw them.  i turned to my mother and children, asking if they saw it too?  apparently not.  so i stood there for a few seconds with them, when the lights reappeared.  my mother was so excited that she ran into the house to get her camera.  

my daughter was in the car at this time, and my mother, my son, and i stepped up on the back porch.  the lights came back on again, and then faded out.  we waited when the same thing reappeared again in the far distance to the west.  again, those lights disappeared and were again right in front of us.  then they faded and showed up farther east.

at this time, i wasn't sure if there were three of them, or just one with the ability to transport?  

this was not some sort of "maybe" a ufo.  it was no doubt - blatantly obvious - what this was.

it reappeared directly in front of us again with the three orange lights pointing toward our direction.  those lights went out, and four lights on the east side of it came on in a straight line.  then the object started moving toward us very slowly.  i became a little concerned with my daughter in the car, and told her to come up on the porch with us.  she was so scared [not in her character - she doesn't scare at all!]  that she was physically frozen in her seat and crying for me.  i had to go get her, hide her face in my shoulder and take her inside to my father.

we have a couple of pictures - not very good.  i asked my son and mother why they didn't put on the video, and my mom said she didn't know how to set her camera for that. i have cropped a couple of the attached photos for better seeing.
content.summary: First three very large orange lights in the sky.  no pattern to the three, then four very large orange lights appeared in a row.

content.detailedDescription:
Saw similar a couple years ago outside same window. moved and changed directions so i can say it was not a plane as it came at, away and right to left of me with only a solid red/orange light.

went opposite direction of wind. 

kids toy? a kids helecopter landed near by the night before but this was high and went what appeared to be out of range for an rc toy.

solid light that shimmered like a star and would dim to solid light at times.
content.summary: Orange light that moved towards then away from house. dimmed in the distance.

content.detailedDescription: A massive, black craft flew very, very slowly over the treetops in my neighborhood. it was so large that when i stopped my car to look, it was all i could see out of my windshield and windows.  it didn't make any sound at all, and the trees didn't sway or make any noise, like they would if something like a helicopter or other craft flew so close to them.It was right over my head, only the distance from the ground to right over the trees. it moved really slowly over the neighborhood going north west/west and i watched it till it disappeared. again, it made absolutely no noise. when it flew over, it blocked out other sounds...Either that, or i was so focused on the craft that i didn't hear nearby traffic.
content.summary: Massive, totally quiet triangle shaped object flew slowly over my neighborhood right over the trees.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of st. michael church at wychwood avenue and st. clair on tuesday march 31st.  i usually take two pictures to make sure the quality is good. around thursday of last week i was checking out the pictures when i realized that there were two dark objects in the picture.  the two objects show up in both the pictures which were taken within 5 seconds of each other.  the objects do not look like any birds, balloons or commercial aircraft that i know and everyone i show the picture to is unable to identify the objects.
content.summary: Two dark objects hovering in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
At approx 2030 at night on work property i observed in n nw sky a bright round object. seemed to be over the hiway very high up in altitude. much brighter than any star around, skies were clear. it was stationary. 
i thought maybe it was a helicopter or plane, but it didn't move. then i thought maybe it did a quick tight figure eight maneuver, not sure, maybe i just moved a little and i thought it moved??? then it was stationary again. then i thought i know of no helicopter or airplane that could do that.
i then called for a friend to come out and look too. she did, she thought at one time it moved too??
after about 20 minutes i called the local police station officer to come over and he did. he said it was a planet, and laughed at me. i told him i say it moved! he said as long as it's not on this property we don't care. he laughed and left. 
i was at work so i couldn't stay outside and continue to watch it. i did take lots of photographs of object though.
later i brought up the photos and checked them and in several of the photos it appears to be a cylinder type object. no one who viewed it saw this. it's only in the zoom that i noticed the cylinder object, but the majority
of the photos it is just a bright round object.???
after about 45 minutes i went back into the building.
two hours later i went back out during my lunch and it was gone.

in the past month i have observed the bright light same position in the sky but cannot get another photo with cylinder type of object.
many other employees have seen it at about the same time. 
i thought i saw it in the sky at home which is 33 miles away at 2030 too.
is it a satellite? a planet? i don't think planets are cylinder type do you?
another policeman who i work with came by and said it was venus. i don't believe the cylinder picture is venus.
content.summary: First observe was bright round light, in snapshots on camera afterwards found the cylinder shaped object, didnt see this when outside observing.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: [address removed/cms/rjl] i looked up in front of us out of the windshield just as my wife said  " do you see this?!" there were a series of 4 lights (may have been more) in a line. it reminded me of a leading edge of a stealth bomber, that boomerang shape. but much much bigger. if you could see the object, it would stretch across a good part of the sky.  they were heading east/north east as well. they were present for about 5-10 seconds and then just vanished. the trajectory they were travelling showed no evidence of them being re-lit or turning back on. they did not appear to fall down. they just vanished. my wife asked me "ok. so what was that?" we discussed the details and agreed we saw the same thing. and that we did not know what it could be, but it did not fit what we would expect in shape or behavior from conventional air craft.
content.summary: Series of lights that suddenly stopped mid-air and vanished above us.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving west along the lake ontario state parkway, back in 2012, when i lived near charlotte beach at night - 11pmish it was the weekend and i was heading to hamlin beach area to visit a friend. on long drives i tend to stargaze but this time i noticed an odd object.

at first i figured it was a shooting star, blue-green color and streak across the sky, even made a wish. then i thought blue-green was an odd color for a shooting star; so i distinctly remember thinking i had to look up what metal content would have to be in a meteor or meteorite to cause that. however the object went from a colored blur moving quickly and a speck to something that would be between golfball and basketball sized at arms length. the lights on it were bright that i could only really make out a vague shape at distance - cigar is best suited but without fine detail i could not say. the light shifted between an inner color and outer exterior color ringing the lower section. it would go blue, blue-green, white, green-blue, green and pulsed in that pattern. i could not discern a timing but it was not on a steady timing it was a shifting pattern.

it started in the north-west portion of the sky, i know this because it was to the upper right of my windshield while i headed west. i pulled over to get out my cell phone to start taking pictures. this is when things got odd, and why i have only ever told one person about this, because of fear of ridicule. so i pulled over, got my cellphone out, and just as i did this i saw 2 black suvs go past at a very very high rate of speed. the last blind spot on the road was miles behind me, so not having seen them before now and with how fast they went off down the road, they were doing over 100mph. there were no plates on the back - just black that matched the paint of the vehicles. i know they were black because my headlights gave me a quick glimpse.

i go to turn my camera app on, on my phone and - the phone is dead. same time headlights sputter and go out, i try to start the car and no response at all in the vehicle. no radio, nothing. so i look down the road and no tail-lights either. they were visible moments before but now just dark. the area was already very dark with no lights in range i could notice so i do not know if there were any other areas with power out. i watch as the object hovers over the nw portion of the sky - quickly zips to almost directly north - hovers - ne - hovers - then back to the starting nw and hovers. the whole time moving and changing directions like no aircraft i know off - though experimental is always possible.

all of a sudden my car turns on - no keys in the ignition, just on. lights on, radio on to what sounded like a mix of static and modem dial-up connection, and my cell phone was turning on. i go to start the camera app look up and the object zips off into the night sky at an ascending angle looking like a shooting-star in reverse. i then see two suv's that could have been the same ones heading east and a slower rate of speed down the parkway. the radio goes back to music - and i call my friend to say i am going home because i feel ill. 

since then i have only told my now ex-fiance, who told me to stop thinking dreams are reality, and i figured if she would react like that others likely would too so i kept my mouth shut... but since i have been watching ufo shows and reading whatever i can, but separating hard science from second hand he-said she-said on the net is difficult. i saw the show advertised on amazon, watched, and figured... well cannot hurt to write what i saw because at the least you might have another matching report of this area or similar ones to actually link hard evidence and first hand accounts.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Unusual object over lake ontario - north of lake ontario parkway

content.detailedDescription:
i was working on a project inside my garage, when i witnessed this disc.
 the disc appeared stationary, and close to my proximity. the disc was glowing orange with yellow lights. the disc appeared for about five minutes, and disappeared. i felt a certain heat beaming into my body while i was observing it.
content.summary: Orange glowing disc with bright yelloow lights

content.detailedDescription: I saw this amazing video in the internet
content.summary: Classic tipe among clouds

content.detailedDescription: Myself and a friend had been standing out by a fire and it had been a light rain for more that three hours and about 10 pm my friend got in his truck to go home when i heard him yell out what is that. to my shock the truck lights showed a 5 feet by 10 feet rectangle with a chevron at the top or one end of it. what was really shocking was that the ground inside the circle was dry and warm. as i said it had been raining for more than 3 hours,also it changed the color of the grass. i mean to say that if half of a blade of grass was in the circle it changed half the blade of grass to a different color the photos we took showed what looked to be a kind of code and instead of being the proper color the image came out in black and red with grid pattern inside of it, and others showed it giving of balls of light.
content.summary: Square  and chevron crop circle in back yard with a code on it i have photo

content.detailedDescription:
Observed at least nine glowing orbs over ne 15th street in gainesville, florida moving in a northerly direction from the southeast. description was very similar to case 45505, also in gainesville, on 01/31/13. 

fiance, friend and myself were leaving friend's house ([address remoced/cms/rjl] to drive to an event downtown. objects were very bright and observed as we headed to the car, which was parked on the street. for less than a moment, i thought objects might be a constellation, but orbs were bright orange. then we noticed that they were moving.

group of objects moved in a northern direction from the southeast. they moved at different speeds and on slightly different paths. there was no noticeable wind at ground level. objects disappeared, one by one, as they passed us to the east, some obscured by trees. total time: 5-10 minutes.

objects appeared huge, high up (500ft+) and very bright, but size and distance cannot be confirmed. they may very well have been chinese sky lanterns released from mlk skatepark to the south, or even duval park further to the southeast.

it was an unexpected and enjoyable, though puzzling, event :)
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Nine glowing orbs over ne gainesville; chinese sky lanterns?

content.detailedDescription: [address removed/cms/rjl] i then saw a saucer type large circular grey object with blue and red flashing lights.  it came down slanted almost 30 feet from me on the east and was around the height of a walking bridge with lights flashing.  it went off to the east side almost like it was going to land.  i was in shock and excited.  i called 911 and told them.  the police asked what direction it was going and i told them " east of 35w and down."
content.summary: Driving south noticed blue & red lights flashing, drove on and saw saucer at the height of a bridge

content.detailedDescription: I work as a security officer abs i seen it hovering and grabbed my phone and shot the video
content.summary: Strange light

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside, i was in az visiting, i went out side to observe stars. i noticed what i first thought was a twinkling star. than i noticed more of a blinking with many different colors blue,red,green,orange,white after going inside for approx, 2 minutes i got my binocs and my mother. when i looked through the binocs i could see a disc shaped object just hovering. my mother saw it to just so i had a witness.It was there a couple of hours. i tried to get its attention with a light but no dice. i checked every 15 minutes. after 2 and a half hours it disappeared. it looked like it was under orions belt. i was in az for twelve days this was the second time i saw it. i know the difference between a plane and a ship of sorts. this was a ufo i know what i saw and my mother saw. i have been self investigating myself for 10 years using info i learned on mufon and other various sites. this was the most amazing thing i have ever witnessed. i live in nj and was visiting az. which is a hotspot. it was stationary like it was watching. it eventually disappeared. so in twelve days it was seen 2 times the first time was a half an hor the 2nd time was 2.5 hours.  i was elated to see this,it took 7 years since i became active as a self investigator. but like i said this was a ufo and nothing else i know the difference. thank you.
content.summary: Blinking

content.detailedDescription:
On april 19th 2015 i was outside on my deck [address removed/cms/rjl]with an approx. 240 degree view from n-nw to s-sw with boeing field ( kbfi ) and seatac intl airport ( ksea ) flight lines in view at all times of the day and night. 

at approx 11:10 pm pst i witnessed a twin propeller alaska airlines flight ( i know the airplane and carrier from experience and flight paths ) depart seatac intl. airport and fly due north before making a westward turn towards my location at the above address.

when the airplane was almost directly overhead ( approx 85-87 degrees ) i witnessed what appeared to be a very bright red circular object/orb appear off the right wing of the plane. 

this bright red object followed the plane before i ran to the sliding door on our deck and called for my girlfriend to come witness this object and as she came outside, the object disappeared but during the time i witnessed the object it paralleled the airplane off the right wing in perfect alignment with the airplane in a westward direction before disappearing.

my girlfriend and i were on the deck and as i am showing as well as describing what i saw to her, a very bright streak appeared directly overhead moving west to east in what i approximate to be the very same path the object i initially saw take with the airplane.

this streak was very sudden and abrupt and travelling at extreme speed ( i did not see an object with this "streak" whatever it was ) but found it to be coincidental considering what i had just witnessed.

my girlfriend and i stayed on the deck for apprx another 2-3 mins before coming inside perplexed as to what we had just witnessed but i felt it necessary to file a report to mufon so a record of this occurrence is made.
content.summary: Red dot object appearing off the wing of an airplane.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside on my front porch when i noticed it.
it was an unusually bright light that moved unsteadily in the sky.
not smooth like a helicopter or airplane.
i watched and went to grab the camera to zoom in on it, but the battery was dead. so ended up getting my cell phone to take a photo and video.
the photo shows the object as red, but the video shows the rotating lights in other colors like a green and bright white.
also shows that it just vanished (as if went into stealth mode)without a trace.
my feelings was like wow... what was that? 
i have been wanting to see a real ufo so i am hoping i am not just seeing things and being wishful.
i lost site of object went it went stealth on me.
content.summary: Pulsating light vanishes when i start recording

content.detailedDescription:
I was having a cigarette while my bf was pulling up the blind on our porch when i said is that a drone?
he said no. i don't know what that is. we watched it. it was hard to watch and focus on. its lights really made it fuzzy to see. it almost had an appearance like on fire although it wasn't. 
we watched it for awhile, until we saw a 2nd one coming. 
we watched that one until it just disappeared in the sky.
an airplane would have been visible a lot farther out that that object was.
[address removed/cms/rjl]. i would guess that by the time the object was by sunnyside, they disappeared. (approx 3 miles down the road)
our feelings were more like hmm... were those ufos or military?
not scared or nervous.
i then pulled up the picture and video i had taken on april 2, 2015 at 1137 pm of a similar object. that was spinning and changing lights. disappeared overhead as if it shut lights off.
content.summary: Bright red/orange light as if on fire traveling south in sky
